pull.title: build: Add travis build:passing/failing indicator to github front page.

events.body: ACK on the principle, but I'd place it below the header.
I guess this should wait until the travis problems are cleared up?
Right, a failing build indicator is no fun

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4766_5a0823a09bbd01a16725ff21e433c285ffc2849a/ for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.
